definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: For the same reason, our party abhors the deification of an individual.
sentences.chinese: 因为这样，我们党也厌弃对于个人的神化。

sentences.english: Mr Luxun had been alert to obeying the public and deifying the public.
sentences.chinese: 盲从大众，神化大众，一直是鲁迅所警惕的。

sentences.english: The Commune has been mythologized by socialists and revolutionaries ever since.
sentences.chinese: 已被神化了公社的社会主义者和革命者至今。

sentences.english: This deification might make him the laughing stock of India…
sentences.chinese: 儿子的神化可能会让他成为印度的笑柄。

sentences.english: There is no antidote for Tiberium. Divination is death.
sentences.chinese: 根本没有泰矿的解毒剂，神化就等于死亡。

sentences.english: In the history of art healthy body was being mythologized.
sentences.chinese: 在艺术史上，健美的身体都会被神化。

sentences.english: I don't think anybody will deify kennedy.
sentences.chinese: 并非人人都会神化肯尼迪。

sentences.english: In America they really do mythologise people when they die.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，人死后就会被神化。

sentences.english: So the world is sort of de-divinized. Demythologized.
sentences.chinese: 因此世界不再被神化，没有了神话的色彩。

sentences.english: In fact, there are other ways to understand the Christian teaching of deification.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，我们有其他了解基督的神化教导的方式。

sentences.english: Clearly this is a myth that Milton is identifying with very strongly here.
sentences.chinese: 很明显弥尔顿与这神化产生了强烈的共鸣。

sentences.english: Not I but God Himself deified it.
sentences.chinese: 但神化灵魂的是上帝本人。

sentences.english: The WASP myth is mainly about several types of apotheosis in American culture.
sentences.chinese: 白人新教神话主要是关于美国文化中几种形式的神化。

sentences.english: In North Korea, he and his father are deified, considered saviors of the whole universe.
sentences.chinese: 在朝鲜，他和他老爹都被神化，奉为宇宙间的救世主。

sentences.english: The detail to which Egyptians sought to deify the concept of time is worthy of note.
sentences.chinese: 埃及人神化时间概念的详情是值得人们关注的。

sentences.english: He was later deified and is thought by some Hindu denominations to be an avatar of Vishnu.
sentences.chinese: 他后来被神化，被一些印度教徒称为毗瑟奴的化身。

definition: to honor sb as a God (idiom); to revere/to worship/to deify/to make a holy cow of sth/to put sb on a pedestal
to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
magic transformation performed by Daoist immortal/fig. to reveal/to enlighten
Daoist School of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC), based on the teachings of Laozi or Lao-tze 老子[Lao3 zi3] (c. 500 BC-) and Zhuangzi 庄子 (369-286 BC)
